alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 1:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Tooele County through 230 PM MDT... At 156 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Utah Test and Training Range South, or 35 miles southeast of Wendover, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
